int_blocked:
Open a Lightning connection and send or receive bitcoin instantly.

Unfortunately, Bitkit cannot provide automatic Lightning connections to residents of the United States & Canada (yet).
int_text: Open a Lightning connection and send or receive bitcoin instantly.
error_channel_receiving: Receiving amount needs to be greater than ${usdValue}
enter_money: Enter the amount of money you want to be able to spend instantly.
enter_amount: Choose how much bitcoin you want to be able to spend instantly and how much you want to keep in savings.
note_blocktank_limit: The amount you can transfer to your spending balance is currently limited to ${usdValue}.
note_reserve_limit: The amount you can transfer to your spending balance is limited to 80%. You need to keep funds in reserve to move this bitcoin back to savings.
quick_confirm_cost: It costs <white>{amount}</white> to connect you to Lightning and set up your spending balance.
spending_amount_bitcoin: Choose how much bitcoin you want to have available as your instant spending balance.
receiving_amount_money: Choose how much money you want to be able to receive instantly.
receiving_amount_bitcoin: Enter the amount of Bitcoin you want to be able to receive instantly.
custom_confirm_cost: It costs <white>{amount}</white> to connect you and set up your spending balance. Your Lightning connection will stay open for at least <whiteWithKeyboard>{weeks} week(s)</whiteWithKeyboard>.<whiteWithKeyboard><penIcon/></whiteWithKeyboard>
duration_text: Choose the minimum number of weeks you want your connection to remain open.
setting_up_text: Please wait and keep Bitkit open while your Lightning connection is being set up. This process takes about a minute.
result_text: Lightning connection initiated. You will be able to use instant payments in ±10 minutes.
timeout_text: Bitkit will keep trying to open your Lightning connection in the background. Please keep the app open.
transfer_close: There is a small cost to transfer your full spending balance back to your savings. The exact fee depends on network conditions.
transfer_open: It costs <white>{amount}</white> to transfer the additional funds to your spending balance.
ts_savings_text: Transferring funds from your spending balance to your savings. You will be able to use these funds in <purple>±1 hour</purple>.
ts_spendings_text: Transferring funds from your savings to your spending balance. You will be able to use these funds in <purple>±20 minutes</purple>.
interrupted_text: Funds were not transferred yet. Bitkit will try to initiate the transfer during the next 30 minutes. Please keep your app open.
availability_text:
Transferring funds to savings usually takes
±1 hour, but settlement may take <purple>14 days</purple> under certain network conditions.
node_id_copied: Successfully copied LDK Node ID to clipboard.
node_failed: Bitkit failed to initialize the Lightning node.
error_add_tor: Unable to add tor nodes at this time.
error_fulfill_title: Unable to fulfill the requested invoice amount
copied_couterparty: Copied Counterparty Node ID to Clipboard
close_text:
There is a small cost to close this Lightning Connection and transfer your full spending balance back to your savings. The exact fee depends on network conditions.

Transferring funds to savings usually takes ±1 hour, but settlement may take <white>14 days</white> under certain network conditions.
force_text: Could not initiate transfer. Do you want to force this transfer? You won’t be able to use these funds for ±14 days (!)
force_init_msg: Your funds will be accessible in ±14 days.
force_failed_msg: Something went wrong when trying to close the channel.
channel_opened_msg: You can now pay anyone, anywhere, instantly.
